Tunable.name: adjustment_cone_angle
Tunable.description: The angle in radians of the social adjustment cone in front of the target sim during a social super interaction.

Tunable.name: constraint_expansion_amount
Tunable.description: The amount, in meters, to expand the Sim's current constraint by when calculating fallback social constraints. This number should be equal to the tuned radius for the standard social group constraint minus a nominal amount, such as 1 meter to prevent extremely small intersections from being considered valid.

Tunable.name: incompatible_target_sim_route_nearby_frequency
Tunable.display: Incompatible Target Sim Route Nearby Frequency
Tunable.description: The number of sim minutes to delay in between routing nearby the target Sim of a social interaction if they are in an incompatible state (such as sleeping).

Tunable.name: maximum_intended_distance_to_route_nearby
Tunable.display: Maximum Intended Distance To Route Nearby
Tunable.description: The maximum distance in meters from the target Sim's current position to their intended position where a Sim will stop the target Sim instead of routing to their intended position. Note: this only applies to Sims who are trying to socialize with a target Sim at higher-priority than the interaction that Sim is running.

Tunable.name: minimum_adjustment_cone_radius
Tunable.description: The minimum radius in meters, that the Sim needs to be in front of the target Sim when running social adjustment before a social super interaction.

Tunable.name: minimum_delay_between_route_nearby_attempts
Tunable.display: Minimum Delay Between Route Nearby Attempts
Tunable.description: The minimum delay, in Sim minutes, between route nearby attempts when a social is in the head of a Sim's queue. NOTE: This is performance- critical so please don't change this unless you know what you are doing.

Tunable.name: num_sides_for_circle_expansion_of_point_constraint
Tunable.display: Num Sides For Circle Expansion Of Point Constraint
Tunable.description: The number of sides to use when creating a circle for expanding point constraints for the fallback social constraint.

Tunable.name: BUFF_CLOTHING_REASON
Tunable.description: The localized string used to give reason why clothing buff was added. Does not support any tokens.

Tunable.name: FOREIGN_ZONE_BUFF
Tunable.description: This buff is applied to any sim that is not in their home zone. It is used by autonomy for NPCs to score the GoHome interaction.

TunableList.name: MULTI_MOTIVE_BUFF_MOTIVES
TunableList.description: Buffs, Motives and the threshold needed for that motive to count towards the multi motive buff

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Buff that is added when all the motives are above their threshold

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: Motives and the threshold needed for that motive to count towards the multi motive buff

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Motive needed above threshold to get the buff

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Threshold at which this motive counts for the buff

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.
